memberdef.name: MUDA_KERNEL_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer: { \ if constexpr(::muda::RUNTIME_CHECK_ON) \ { \ if(!(res)) \ { \ MUDA_KERNEL_PRINT("%s(%d): %s:\n <assert> " #res " failed. " fmt, \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__, \ MUDA_FUNCTION_SIG, \ ##__VA_ARGS__); \ MUDA_DEBUG_TRAP(); \ } \ } \ }

memberdef.name: MUDA_KERNEL_CHECK
memberdef.initializer: { \ if constexpr(::muda::RUNTIME_CHECK_ON) \ { \ if(!(res)) \ { \ MUDA_KERNEL_PRINT("%s(%d): %s:\n <check> " #res " failed. " fmt, \ __FILE__, \ __LINE__, \ MUDA_FUNCTION_SIG, \ ##__VA_ARGS__); \ } \ } \ }
